adrFormatAddress: 828 9th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA

editorialSummary.text: Clubby music & a popular all-you-can-drink weekend brunch lend this Italian steakhouse a party vibe.

originalText.text: I had an exceptional experience celebrating my girlfriend's birthday. Although the bill was somewhat higher, the party and service were truly outstanding. If you're unwilling to invest in a memorable experience, perhaps opting for a more mundane choice is advisable. The waitstaff graciously accommodated all our requests, attending to every detail, including customized food selections from the Ã  la carte menu.

originalText.text:
My experience here was okay. #1 we had a reservation at 4pm, but then around 3:30 they called us to say they double booked us and moved us to 6pm. That was really inconvenient and not fair. #2 we tried to shoot our shot and tried to go in around 5:15 as we were all already there and trying to wait until 6. They let us sit earlyâ€¦ when we got inside there was a lot of empty/free tables.

The menu is prefixed so either you go for the $50/75/150. And of course the more money you spend the better options you get for food. Also the choices of the bottle you receive increases with price.

The food was okay, but it didnâ€™t merit $75. No bottle of mimosa is worth even close to that. Or a chicken sandwich. I understand that the place needs to make profit but ummâ€¦

The DJ was good. People were dancing on the dance floor

Also if you want to go somewhere and chat with your friends this is not it. Itâ€™s extremely loud and dark. So youâ€™re yelling and yelling some more to hear each other. And using your phone flash light to see the menu.

The bouncers outside was my favorite part. Very friendly and welcoming.

A lot of people were celebrating their birthdays.

As for me, I think this is the first and last time.

originalText.text: My cousin found this gem when she came to visit. I have to say I am ashamed that my out of town cousin put a New York native on to this brunch party. This brunch was elite. They give you your own personal bottle of prosecco with your $65 brunch and you can select 1 entrÃ©e. The location being in Chelsea makes the price even better. The staff was very efficient,  we didn't wait long before seated. After ordering, the food came quick as well and let me tell you that Mac and those Fries... that's all I am going to say ðŸ˜Œ

originalText.text: Cafeteria food with cheap wine and champagne on prefix menu. Called the owner the next day to dispute and he hung up on me.

originalText.text: I enjoyed the place. Went on Sunday for a birthday brunch. The food was decent. Love the fact that they give you an entire bottle for each person. Itâ€™s a bit tight. Thereâ€™s seating on the dance floor. Thatâ€™s they only part I didnâ€™t care for. Other than that loud music. Good DJ. Had a really good time. Would come back.
